title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: But ah've goat a wee bitty business masel this affie, so ah'm turnin doon the Newhaven Road, Bowtow-bound.Whin ah gits tae the lock-up Matty's awready thaire. Ah've goat tae say right fae the off that Matty's one ay the few boys ah jist cannae git oan wi.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Alison thought of the last funeral she was at. It would have been Gary McVie from school, who'd died on Newhaven Road, driving home a stolen car while drunk. He was a young, popular and good-looking boy, and there had been a big turnout.
